subject: Climate & Environment
title: The 30 by 30 Target
description: A quick, practical guide to The 30 by 30 Target.

hook.text: In 2022, 196 nations agreed to protect 30% of Earth's land and ocean by 2030.

buildup.text: Currently about 17% of land and 8% of ocean are under some form of protection.

discovery.text: Meeting the target would double marine protection and significantly expand land reserves.

twist.text: Protection on paper means little without enforcement, funding, and community involvement.

climax.text: Indigenous-led conservation has the best track record â€” it must be central to the plan.

punchline.text: Thirty percent is a start. Nature needs room to breathe.

quiz.question: What does the '30 by 30' target aim to protect by 2030?
